name: Kodoku: Mîtobôru mashin
description: Kodoku: Mîtobôru mashin is a movie starring Tomori Abe, Kensuke Ashihara, and Satoshi Eishima. A long-awaited sequel to the internationally acclaimed full-throttle splatter sci-fi action horror "Meatball Machine".
